LanguageData.SteelElixirAddiction.label: steel elixir addiction
LanguageData.SteelElixirAddiction.description:
A chemical addiction to steel elixir. Long-term presence of steel elixir has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug.
Without regular doses of steel elixir, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.SteelElixirHigh.label: high on steel elixir
LanguageData.SteelElixirHigh.description: An effect after drinking the steel elixir, granting increased damage resistance and immunity to fire.
LanguageData.SteelElixirTolerance.label: steel elixir tolerance
LanguageData.SteelElixirTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to steel elixir. The more severe this tolerance is, the more steel elixir it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.SteelElixirTolerance.stages.small.label: small
LanguageData.SteelElixirTolerance.stages.large.label: large
LanguageData.TobaccoAddiction.label: tobacco addiction
LanguageData.TobaccoAddiction.stages.withdrawal.label: withdrawal
LanguageData.TobaccoHigh.label: smoked some tobacco leaves
LanguageData.TobaccoHigh.description: A side effect after smoking a tobacco pipe.
LanguageData.TrollsBloodElixirAddiction.label: trolls blood elixir addiction
LanguageData.TrollsBloodElixirAddiction.description:
A chemical addiction to trolls blood elixir. Long-term presence of trolls blood elixir has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug.
Without regular doses of trolls blood elixir, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.TrollsBloodElixirHigh.label: high on trolls blood elixir
LanguageData.TrollsBloodElixirHigh.description: An effect after drinking the trolls blood elixir, which can regenerate permanent and fatal wounds, and cure chronic illnesses instantaneously, although in exchange of increased hunger rate.
LanguageData.TrollsBloodElixirTolerance.label: trolls blood elixir tolerance
LanguageData.TrollsBloodElixirTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to trolls blood elixir. The more severe this tolerance is, the more trolls blood elixir it takes to get the same effect.
